sourcesContent:
function getOrdinals(num){
    switch(num){
        case 1 || 21 || 31:
            return "st"
        case 2, 22:
            return "nd"
        case 3, 23:
            return "rd"
        case num >= 4 && num <= 20:
            return "th"
        case 24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30:
            return "th"
    }
}

module.exports = getOrdinals
